Description: Magical gem; intaglio; rock crystal; long oval; engraved on the obverse: rayed and nimbed lion-headed figure facing right wearing chlamys, tunic, skirt, boots and holding globe; inscribed on the reverse.
Bibliographic references: Michel 2001 / Die Magischen Gemmen im Britischen Museum (267)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Greville John Chester
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: G464 (Burns Gnostic Gem Number)
Other BM number: OA.9935 (Registration number and/or Big number reinstated in 2023)
